about_the_game:
The prequel to Grey Heritage: Faded Vision and a strong starting point for new players. Grey Heritage: Noble Duty is an anime Tactical RPG set in a medieval fantasy. Whether you are a newcomer to the genre or a veteran player, there is something for everybody.

The year is 755, a decade before the events of Grey Heritage: Faded Vision. Emperor Augustus wages war against all of Calista. You play Jaden Ricard, a Lord of Astrea. Deemed a traitor after abandoning his posts during the invasion, Jaden must travel the continent and assemble allies from neighboring countries if he wishes to uphold his duty as a Lord of Astrea.




Command your army and overcome difficult scenarios to uphold your duty as a Lord of Astrea. Train your army, manage inventories, and forge friendships as you travel this war-stricken land. A strong entry for newcomers to the genre and unique twists for veterans.


Some other features include:

  • No permadeath.
  • About 10-15 hour-long campaign.
  • 10 playable characters.
  • Save Checkpoints scattered throughout the map.
  • Critical attack inflicting states.
  • A base to shop for inventory and get to know your allies.

Learn the origin of the war that leads to Grey Heritage: Faded Vision. Fight enemies in tactical combat and manage your army in this JRPG inspired journey!
